name: Cordyception
description:
Play as a worker ant whose existence in its colony gets completely overthrown by a parasitic infection. Survive using your newfound abilities in top-down bullet-hell fashion.

We recommend to play this game with keyboard and mouse. Playing with a gamepad is also possible. If you have an older system we recommend downloading the executable file for better performance.

Here is more information on the real-life fungus.

Credits

A game by Nitai Heeb and Nils Wallenfang.

Majority of Art by Stefan Horrmann

Epic Battle Music by Arthur Maxant

Menu and intro music by Jonas Lemmen & Markus Horrmann.

Smaller art contributions made by Navid Jansen, Erman Baglan, Niels Asselborn, Cedric Haaks, Dominik Goebels.

This game was created as an entry to Game Off 2021.
